short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab page in 8 bit for crypto enthusiasts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Track your favorite crypto coins with live pricing data.

2. Feeling lucky? Drop a coin in the crypto fountain.

Enjoy! More features to come. Email us if you have feedback: cryptonewtab@gmail.com
